= Example ism (InstallShield) file

The `PwdManagerInstallerV2.ism` file in this directory are obtained from the dpasswd project:
https://github.com/dpasswd/client-windows-installshield

The file here is from:

* https://github.com/dpasswd/client-windows-installshield/blob/main/PwdManagerInstallerV2.ism
